name: WrightSock Coolmesh II Quarter Socks - Children
description: These double layer socks reduce friction and prevent blisters. The inner layer pulls moisture away from the skin, while the outer layer allows maximum airflow.Both layers are Dri-Wright II polyester, nylon and LYCRA®.Mesh panels provide air flow to keep your feet cool.Stabilizer zone in arches locks socks in place.
